verbs.description: President Trump [V: will] address the nation on the path forward in the 16-year war in Afghanistan that has cost thousands of lives and billions of dollars .
[ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: address] [ARG1: the nation] [ARGM-ADV: on the path forward in the 16-year war in Afghanistan that has cost thousands of lives and billions of dollars] .
President Trump will address the nation on the path forward in the 16-year war in Afghanistan that [V: has] cost thousands of lives and billions of dollars .
President Trump will address the nation on the path forward in [ARG1: the 16-year war in Afghanistan] [R-ARG1: that] has [V: cost] [ARG2: thousands of lives and billions of dollars] .
